channel.title: [PI]Big problem minimap dissapearing
channel.description:
Hello, so uh i got kind of a big glitch i found the fix somewhere but i didn't know i had it too and now i can't find the fix :(
so the thing is when your like in varrock and your with your friend, and when you run away so the dot (wich is your friend) dissapears from the minimap. Now when you run back hes gone and he is still there but i can't see what he says nor see him.. anyway i can fix this? Thanks!
